channel.title: Config on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Config on Arrans github.io

item.title: knadh/koanf
item.description: Simple, extremely lightweight, extensible, configuration management library for Go. Supports JSON, TOML, YAML, env, command line, file, S3 etc. Alternative to viper.

item.title: caarlos0/env
item.description: A simple, zero-dependencies library to parse environment variables into structs

item.title: TomWright/dasel
item.description: Select, put and delete data from JSON, TOML, YAML, XML and CSV files with a single tool. Supports conversion between formats and can be used as a Go package.

item.title: Boeing/config-file-validator
item.description: Cross Platform tool to validate configuration files
